0.Name: Doarei
0.Description: Doarei connects people who can donate and people who need something, enabling them to help themselves. I am co-founder and developer of this project that already has more than 100,000 page views and more than 2,000 users.
0.Long_description: Doarei is a Brazilian site created in 2016 by me and Francielle Morais, with the purpose of helping people. I was responsible for all the development and graphic creation.

1.Name: Cl7ck
1.Description: Cl7ck is a small time management project designed to study and improve my skills with design patterns and frameworks. Cl7ck is simple and open source.
1.Long_description: CL7CK was made with codeigniter and bootstrap. The source code is hosted on Github
